DataElement.preferredName: Central Nervous System Toxicity Less Than or Equal To Grade 2 Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator related to the degree to which something is poisonous at the part of the nervous system that consists of the brain, spinal cord, and meninges are the same or is smaller than grade 2 is determined.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Central Nervous System Toxicity Less Than or Equal To Grade 2 Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The degree to which something is poisonous at the part of the nervous system that consists of the brain, spinal cord, and meninges are the same or is smaller than grade 2 is determined.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The part of the nervous system that consists of the brain, spinal cord, and meninges. :Toxicity; the degree to which something is poisonous.

Concepts.definition: The part of the nervous system that consists of the brain, spinal cord, and meninges.
The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects of something.

Property.preferredName: Less Than or Equal To Grade 2 Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition:
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.:A morphologic qualifier indicating that a cancerous lesion is moderately-well differentiated.
:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.
A morphologic qualifier indicating that a cancerous lesion is moderately differentiated.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
